flawed_nl_solution:
The adult pigs ate 3/5*300 = <<3/5*300=1500/3>>1500/3 straws.
The total number of straws that the piglets shared is 300-1500/3 = <<300-1500/3=-200>>-200
Since there were 20 piglets, each piglet ate -200/20 = <<-200/20=-10>>-10 straws
#### -10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 1500/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
